dict.acceptation: 反应；反作用力；反动；保守；

sent.orig: AAR can be assorted two classifications: Alkali-Silica Reaction (ASR) and Alkali-Carbonate Reaction (ACR).
sent.trans: AAR主要分两类：碱-硅酸反应(Alkali-Silica Reaction,简称ASR)和碱-碳酸盐反应(Alkali-CarbonateReaction,简称ACR)。

sent.orig: Alkali-aggregate reaction (AAR) is one of significant factors affecting durability of concrete structures.
sent.trans: 碱-集料反应(Alkali-Aggregate Reaction, AAR)是影响混凝土耐久性的重要因素。

sent.orig: Alkali|aggregate reaction(AAR)may be divided into two kinds:alkali|silica reaction (ASR) and alkali carbonate reaction (ACR).
sent.trans: 碱集料反应(AAR)可分为两类，即碱硅酸反应(ASR)与碱碳酸盐反应(ACR)。

sent.orig: The reaction of combustion to produce ethylene is a spontaneous reaction judging by reaction activation energy.
sent.trans: 由反应活化能可知，生成乙烯的反应是一个自发式反应。

sent.orig: Cyadox was synthesized from benzofurazan by three steps including Beirut reaction, Redox reaction and Addition reaction.
sent.trans: 喹赛多的合成路线：以苯并呋咱一氧化物为起始原料，经过贝鲁特缩合、氧化还原反应、西佛碱反应三步反应合成目标产物。
